description: "Alexa, open Simon Says" to hear insightful thought leadership from Simon Wardley.  He is a passionate advocate and researcher in the fields of open source, commoditization, innovation and cybernetics . He is also fond of ducks.  "They're fowl but not through choice".
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Simon Says for a duck
Alexa, ask Simon Says for some thought leadership
name: Simon Says
shortDescription: Simon Says provides free business advice that's worth millions.
